Html: Hey Guys, I do some volunteer work for a habitat preservation fund, whilst also having some limited programming skills [limited being the operative word]; hence, I volunteered to create a site which I based largely on MVC Music Store [So I will basically refer to the project as a variant of Music Store...absolutely loved the tutorial btw]. Anyhow, my question for the experienced web-programmer/admin guys is: are there some obvious flaws/pitfalls I should look at in terms of security for the 'MVC Music Store' that one should/would need to bolster? Basically, if you were to go live with such a site – what would you improve? Thanks in anticipation for any thoughts/advice etc.
You should post this to the MVC forum
